translation.key: {str:VictimName} has been infected
translation.value: {str:VictimName} je zaražen

translation.key: Infected won the round in {sec:RoundDuration}
translation.value: Zaraženi su pobijedili ovu rundu u {sec:RoundDuration}

translation.key: {int:NumHumans} humans won the round
translation.one: Jedan čovjek je pobijedio ovu rundu

translation.key: You have survived, +5 points
translation.value: Preživio si, +5 bodova

translation.key: You have infected {str:VictimName}, +3 points
translation.value: Zarazio si {str:VictimName}, +3 boda

translation.key: You have killed a witch, +5 points
translation.value: Ubio si vješticu, +5 bodova

translation.key: The undead is coming!
translation.value: Undead dolazi!

translation.key: The witch is coming!
translation.value: Vještica dolazi!

translation.value: Nasumičan izbor

translation.value: Pozicija zaključana: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.value: Mreža uključena

translation.value: Vještica je mrtva

translation.value: Undead je napokon mrtav

translation.key: Type "/help {str:ClassName}" for more information about your class
translation.value: Napiši "/help {str:ClassName}" za više informacija o svojoj klasi

translation.key: The Hero found the flag!
translation.value: Heroj je našao zastavu!

translation.key: Hook protection enabled
translation.value: Hook-zaštita uključena

translation.key: Hook protection disabled
translation.value: Hook-zaštita isključena

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} je bannan sa servera ({str:Reason})

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} je izbačen sa servera ({str:Reason})

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} je izašao iz igre ({str:Reason})

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} je izašao iz igre

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} gleda igru

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} se uključio u igru

translation.value: Pušač

translation.value: Nepoznata klasa

translation.key: You are a human: {str:ClassName}
translation.value: Ti si čovjek: {str:ClassName}

translation.key: You are an infected: {str:ClassName}
translation.value: Ti si zaražen: {str:ClassName}

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} entered and joined the game
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} je ušao i uključio se u igru

translation.key: You can't join the spectators right now
translation.value: Ne možeš gledati igru sada

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} changed their name to {str:NewName}
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} je promijenio svoje ime u {str:NewName}

translation.key: Switch language to english ?
translation.value: Prebaciti jezik na engleski?

translation.key: You can change the language of this mod using the command /language.
translation.value: Možeš promijeniti jezik na ovom modu koristeći naredbu /language

translation.key: If your language is not available, you can help with translation (/help translate).
translation.value: Ako tvoj jezik nije dostupan, možeš nam pomoći sa prijevodom (/help translate).

translation.key: InfectionClass, by necropotame (version {str:VersionCode})
translation.value: InfectionClass, napravio necropotame (verzija {str:VersionCode})

translation.key: Based on Infection mod by Gravity
translation.value: Bazirano na Infection modu, napravio Gravity

translation.key: Thanks to {str:ListOfContributors}
translation.value: Zahvaljujući {str:ListOfContributors}

translation.key: Rules of the game
translation.value: Pravila igre

translation.key: InfectionClass is a team game between humans and infected.
translation.value: InfectionClass je timska igra između ljudi i zaraženih.

translation.key: All players start as human.
translation.value: Svi igrači započinju kao ljudi.

translation.key: 10 seconds later, two players become infected.
translation.value: 10 sekundi poslije, dva igrača postanu zaražena.

translation.key: The goal for humans is to survive until the army clean the map.
translation.value: Cilj za ljude je preživjeti sve dok vojska ne očisti mapu.

translation.key: The goal for infected is to infect all humans.
translation.value: Cilj za zaražene je zaraziti sve ljude.

translation.key: How to translate the mod
translation.value: Kako prevesti mod

translation.key: Create an account on Transifex and join a translation team:
translation.value: Napravi račun na Transifex-u i pridruži se timu prevoditelja:

translation.key: For any question about the translation process, please contact us on IRC ({str:IRCAddress})
translation.value: Za pitanja o procesu prevođenja, molimo da nas kontaktirate na IRC ({str:IRCAddress})

translation.key: The Engineer can build walls with his hammer to block infected.
translation.value: Inženjer može raditi zidove sa čekićem.

translation.key: When an infected touch the wall, he dies.
translation.value: Kada zaraženi dotakne zid, on umre.

translation.key: The lifespan of a wall is {sec:LifeSpan}, and walls are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: Zid radi {sec:LifeSpan}, a jedan igrač može napraviti samo jedan zid u isto vrijeme.

translation.key: The Soldier can pose floating bombs with his hammer.
translation.value: Vojnik može postavljati lebdeće bombe sa čekićem.

translation.key: Each bomb can explode {int:NumBombs} times.
translation.one: Svaka bomba može eksplodirati jedan put.

translation.key: Use the hammer to place the bomb and explode it multiple times.
translation.value: Uzmi čekić za postavljanje bombi i aktiviranje više puta.

translation.key: Bombs are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: Bombe su ograničene na jednog igrača u isto vrijeme.

translation.key: The Scientist can pose floating mines with his hammer.
translation.value: Znanstvenik može postaviti ledbeće mine sa čekićem.

translation.key: Mines are limited to {int:NumMines} per player at the same time.
translation.one: Mine su ograničene na jednog igrača u isto vrijeme.
translation.few: Mine su ograničene na {int:NumMines} po igraču u isto vrijeme.
translation.other: Mine su ograničene na {int:NumMines} po igraču u isto vrijeme.

translation.key: He has also grenades that teleport him.
translation.value: Ima i granate koje ga teleportiraju.

translation.key: The Medic can protect humans with his hammer by giving them armor.
translation.value: Liječnik može dati ljudima armor.

translation.key: He has also a powerful shotgun that can pullback infected.
translation.value: Ima i snažan shotgun koji odbacuje zaražene.

translation.key: The Hero has a shotgun, a laser rifle and grenades.
translation.value: Heroj ima shotgun, lasersku pušku i granate.

translation.key: The Hero must find a flag hidden in the map.
translation.value: Heroj mora naći zastavu skrivenu u mapi.

translation.key: Once taken, the flag gives 1 health point, 4 armor points, and full ammo to all humans, furthermore full health and armor to the hero.
translation.value: Kad ju uzme, zastava daje 1 health, 4 armor, i puni municiju svim ljudima, te cijeli health i armor za heroja.

translation.key: The hero cannot be healed by a medic, but he can withstand a thrust by an infected, an his health suffice.
translation.value: Heroja ne može izliječiti liječnik, ali on može izdržati napad zaraženog jer ima dovoljno healtha.

translation.key: The Ninja can throw flash grenades that can freeze infected during three seconds.
translation.value: Nindža može bacati flash granate koje zalede zaražene na tri sekunde.

translation.key: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump {int:NinjaJump} times before touching the ground.
translation.one: Njegov čekić je zamijenjen katanom, može skočiti jedan put prije nego padne.
translation.few: Njegov čekić je zamijenjen katanom, može skočiti {int:NinjaJump} puta prije nego padne.
translation.other: Njegov čekić je zamijenjen katanom, može skočiti {int:NinjaJump} puta prije nego padne.

translation.key: The Mercenary fly in air using his machine gun.
translation.value: Plaćenik leti zrakom koristeći se machine gunom.

translation.key: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal {int:NumDamagePoints} damage points.
translation.one: Može bacati otrovne granate od kojih svaka dijeli jedan damage bod.
translation.few: Može bacati otrovne granate od kojih svaka dijeli {int:NumDamagePoints} damage bodova.
translation.other: Može bacati otrovne granate od kojih svaka dijeli {int:NumDamagePoints} damage bodova.

translation.key: The Sniper can lock his position in air for 15 seconds with his hammer.
translation.value: Snajper može zaključati svoju poziciju u zraku na 15 sekundi koristeći se čekićem.

translation.key: He can jump two times in air.
translation.value: Može skočiti dva puta u zrak.

translation.key: He has also a powerful rifle that deals 20 damage points in locked position, and 9-10 otherwise.
translation.value: Ima i snažnu pušku koja dijeli 20 damage bodova u zaključanoj poziciji, a 9-10 bodova inače.

translation.key: The Smoker can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Pušač može zaraziti ljude i liječiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: He can also inflict 4 damage points per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Nanosi 4 damage boda po sekundi kad huka ljude.

translation.key: The Boomer explodes when he attack.
translation.value: Bumer eksplodira kada napadne.

translation.key: All humans affected by the explosion become infected.
translation.value: Svi ljudi zahvaćeni eksplozijom postanu zaraženi.

translation.key: He can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Može nanijeniti 1 damage bod po sekundi kada huka ljude.

translation.key: The Hunter can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Lovac može zaraziti ljude i liječiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: The Ghost can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Duh može zaraziti ljude i liječiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: He is invisible, except if a human is near him, if he takes a damage or if he use his hammer.
translation.value: Nevidljiv je, osim ako je čovjek blizu, ako primi udarac ili ako koristi čekić.

translation.key: The Spider can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Pauk može zaraziti ljude i liječiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: When selecting any gun, his hook enter in web mode.
translation.value: Kada selektiraš neko oružje, njegov huk prelazi u mrežu.

translation.key: Any human that touch a hook in web mode is automatically grabbed.
translation.value: Kada čovjek dotakne mrežu, ona ga automatski dohvati.

translation.key: The hook of the spider (in both mode) deal 1 damage point per second and can grab a human during 2 seconds.
translation.value: Paukov huk (u oba moda) nanosi 1 damage bod po sekundi i može držati čovjeka 2 sekunde.

translation.key: The Undead can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Undead može zaraziti ljude i liječiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: Instead of dying, he freezes during 10 seconds.
translation.value: Umjesto da umre, on se zaledi na 10 sekundi.

translation.key: If an infected heals him, the freeze effect disappear.
translation.value: Ako ga zaraženi izliječi, odledit će se.

translation.key: The Witch can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Vještica može zaraziti ljude i liječiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: When an infected dies, he may re-spawn near her.
translation.value: Kada zaraženi umre, ponovo će se stvoriti kod nje.

translation.key: If the Witch dies, she disappear and is replaced by an another class of infected.
translation.value: Ako Vještica umre, ona nestaje i zamijenjena je drugom klasom zaraženih.

translation.key: She can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Može nanijeniti 1 damage bod po sekundi kada huka ljude.

translation.key: Available help pages: {str:PageList}
translation.value: Dostupne stranice za pomoć: {str:PageList}

translation.key: Choose a help page with /help <page>
translation.value: Izaberi stranicu za pomoć upisivanjem /help <stranica>

translation.key: A random class will be automatically attributed to you when rounds start
translation.value: Nasumična klasa će ti biti dodijeljena kada započne runda

translation.key: The class selector will be displayed when rounds start
translation.value: Selektor za klase će ti se prikazati kada runda započne

translation.key: Unknown language
translation.value: Nepoznati jezik

translation.key: Available languages: {str:ListOfLanguage}
translation.value: Dostupni jezici: {str:ListOfLanguage}

translation.key: List of commands
translation.value: Lista komandi

translation.key: Press <F3> or <F4> to enable or disable hook protection
translation.value: Pritisni <F3> ili <F4> da bi dopustio ili zabranio zaštitu protiv hukanja

translation.key: No player was found with this name
translation.value: Nije nađen igrač sa tim imenom.

translation.key: Please wait 5 minutes before create an another account
translation.value: Molimo pričekajte 5 minuta prije nego napravite još jedan račun

translation.key: An error occured during the creation of your account.
translation.value: Dogodila se greška pri izradi Vašeg računa.

translation.key: This username is already taken by an existing account
translation.value: Korisničko ime je već zauzeto

translation.key: Your account has been created and you are now logged.
translation.value: Vaš račun je napravljen i sada ste ulogirani.

translation.key: You must be logged to see your rank
translation.value: Morate biti ulogirani da bi vidjeli Vaš rang

translation.key: You must be logged to see your goal
translation.value: Morate biti ulogirani da bi vidjeli svoj cilj

translation.key: You already notify that {str:PlayerName} must be banned
translation.value: Već ste obavjestili da {str:PlayerName} treba biti bannovan

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} wants {str:VictimName} to be banned ({str:Reason})
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} želi da {str:VictimName} bude bannovan ({str:Reason})
